title: Jhin Q doesnt bounce
body: Hey, I've been playing Jhin a lot lately and I've noticed his q doesn't bounce four times. It sometimes bounces 2 or 3 times at most even though the minions are the right next to each other (like the caster minions) So im wondering who else is having that bug or is it just me?{{champion:202}}

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix! ^-^
It's when you auto attack while his q is out, i believe they've been notified already, hopefully a fix will be out soon >.< this new patch sux {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
